subject: Stanley Cup
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Carolina Hurricanes would score in the first period and they tacked on two more against Jussi Markkanen in both the second and third periods on the way to a rout of the Oilers.
snippet: The Carolina Hurricanes would score in the first period and they tacked on two more against Jussi Markkanen in both the second and third periods on the way to a rout of the Oilers.
